partition_audit.check: Ensure /tmp is on a separate partition
partition_audit.recommendation: Update /etc/fstab to mount /tmp on a separate partition.

partition_audit.check: Ensure nodev option is set on /tmp
partition_audit.recommendation: Add 'nodev' to the mount options in /etc/fstab for /tmp.

partition_audit.check: Ensure nosuid option is set on /tmp
partition_audit.recommendation: Add 'nosuid' to the mount options in /etc/fstab for /tmp.

partition_audit.check: Ensure noexec option is set on /tmp
partition_audit.recommendation: Add 'noexec' to the mount options in /etc/fstab for /tmp.
